PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-08912015-06-18,  CH,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of J. PAULINE RAFFERTY of Victoria, British Columbia, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective August 17, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
